Pre-uploaded Media Tests

These will be removed on staging, add them again in app editor.

Change to send email, and the following should happen:

  1. pre auto doc figure gen
  2. auto doc gen
  3. email to user
  4. send webhook - to here
  5. set gather value to "email sent"
